summary: Software developer with 5 years of experience in frontend web development (≈70%) and Java backend development (≈30%). Proficient in Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML/CSS, and a wide range of frameworks and tools including Angular, React, Vue, Spring, Hibernate, REST, and microservices. Strong debugging, problem solving, and collaboration in Agile environments.
